name: encodeForURL
description: Encodes the input string for safe output in URLs to prevent Cross Site Scripting attacks.

params.name: canonicalize
params.description: If set to true, canonicalization happens before encoding. If set to false, the given input string will just be encoded and canonicalization will not happen. By default, when canonicalization is performed, both mixed and multiple encodings will be allowed. To use any other combinations you should canonicalize using canonicalize method and then do encoding.

examples.title: URL Encode a value with escaped HTML entities
